title: Security-Technology Stocks Are Prime Takeover Fodder - Barron's
text:
Technology Trader Security-Technology Stocks Are Prime Takeover Fodder Cyberattacks are spurring interest in security stocks like Palo Alto Networks, Fortinet, and FireEye. Might Cisco or IBM gobble them up? By Tiernan Ray Updated Sept. 26, 2015 2:15 a.m. ET 
The fall reporting season gets under way this week, and one group in technology more than many others will be hard-pressed to show it can keep delivering. 
Security-technology firms such as Palo Alto Networks (ticker: PANW) and Fortinet (FTNT) are among the strongest-performing stocks this year, even after the marketâ€™s reset, and among the most... Get The Full Story
